My Way

Home Info

Prep

What to wear, what to bring:

  • Layers
  • Towel
  • Lunch and / or snacks
  • Drinks
  • Sunglasses
  • Swim suits
  • Sunscreen
  • Games / cards
  • Radio walkie
  • Soft chair


Harbor

  • Harbor: Dusable
  • Dock: B
  • Dock Slip: 35
  • Dock Gate Code: 68820#
  • Boat Door Code: 1675
  • Bathroom Code: 421#


Parking

  • Parking Lockbox Number: 4
  • Parking Lockbox Code: 4153


Bluetooth speaker

  1. Press CALL, rotate the control dial to select PAIRING, then press it
  2. Perform pairing on phone (look for Sony Automotive)
    • If passkey input is required, input 0000
    • When pairing is made, the bluetooth logo stays lit
